column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Dessert was the Chocolate Cream Pie
column2: best dessert I have ever had
column4: and Vanilla Bourbon Chai Tea. The chocolate pie was absolutely the most decadent and delicious dessert I have ever experienced
column5: with a level of flavors and textures unexplicable. A must try for any visit. The merengue did not quite compare
column6: and the tea was pretty good.
